channel.title: Banner Request
channel.description:
soup /g/fx requests,
I need a new banner for my wobsite
Size: 776x143
Background: Some Java/C++/HTML/PHP code (syntax highlighted, I can provide if needed), stock photo of some fancy building, and anything else that's life and programming related (designer's choice here). All of that should have a lowered opacity, and possibly somehow blended together. Color theme should be something like http://www.opensourcetemplates.org/templates/1054723136/images/bg/header_image.jpg
Text: Mael font (http://www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=2604), Red w/ rocky texture and a 7px black outline. It should say io9Labs, and be slightly tilted to the left.
Thanks in advance! ~io9`
P.S. In b4 LOL WOBSITE: http://xkcd.com/148/

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

<3

Something totally professional, like

long shift_and_add(long a, long b, long n)
{
    long r = 0;
    long mask = 0x00000001;

    while(b!=0)
    {
        if (b & mask)
        {
            r = r + a;

            if(r> = n)
                r = r - n;
        }

        b = b >> 1;

        if(b != 0)
        {
            a = a << 1;

            if(a> = n)
                a = a - n;
        }
    }
    return r;
}

^^ == LOLC++

Read full topic
